name: Sheep Dog: Trained Herding Dog Simulator
name_original: Sheep Dog: Trained Herding Dog Simulator
description:
are you a farm person or live in sheep, goat country, Play the sheepherder in this dog shepherd simulation. You know how it is to controll the sheep herds, using dog to control the herds is so easy, Use this shepherd dog to protect . tend and guard the herds. Guarding the sheeps made easy. Keep sheeps to area that is secure, and near your livestick farm. dont let them go stray, wolf are out there watching for them to eat. This herding simulator with dogs is so east to learn how people in sheep country do with their lovely dogs.
-> Country like environment with cattle farm
-> Protect the sheep that go for grazing
-> dont let your cattles, goats go stray
-> use the dog intelligently to control the herds.
